description: Married life keeps Jake Porter from exploring his gay fantasies as much as he'd like, but one look at handy man Leeroy Jones has Jake bulging in his pants, and he throws caution to the wind to indulge in a deep desire. Leeroy is an expert handy man but his specialty is pipe work, and he can tell with one look that Jake is in need of some deep basement renovation. No complaints here, so long as Leeroy hurries up and zips out of that coverall that's keeping Jake from that rock hard dick. Enjoy!
title: Underground Pipe
